description:
T1 Indian Bean û Reduce lower laterals by 2m.
 T6 Ash û Crown lift to 4m, reduce co-dominant stem, remove major deadwood.
 T7 Stump û Fell stump and grind 300mm deep.
 T8 Robinia û Remove major deadwood only.
 T9 Ash û Crown reduce by 3m.
 T12 Norway Maple û Reduce laterals by 20%.
 T15 Hornbeam (Elm) û Reduce north side by 3m to balance.
 T20 Ash û reduce 4 x limbs roadside only by 3m, sever Ivy.
 T33 Cherry û Crown reduce to previous reduction points.
 T34 Cherry û Clear property to previous reduction points.
 T35 Silver Birch û Crown reduce by thinning 15%, remove major dead wood 
 T36 Silver Birch û Remove major deadwood only. 
 T37 Norway Maple û Crown reduce by 1.5m by thinning, balance crown.
 T45 Lime û Crown lift up to 4m, crown thin by 20%.
 T48 Sweet Chestnut û Reduce laterals by 20%.
 T52 Sweet Chestnut û Crown reduce overlong laterals by 2 û 3m.
 T56 Yew û Clear property by 1.5m
 T57 Ash û Fell and replace.
 T58 Cedar û Crown reduce to previous reduction points.
 T59 Ash û Clear property to previous reduction points.
 T60 Lime û reduce north lower limb and east limb by 2m.
 T67 Oak û Remove major deadwood only(inspect for Oak Processionary Moth)
 T72 Oak û Remove major deadwood only, Crown lift to 4m (inspect for Oak Processionary Moth)
 T73 Holm Oak û Reduce to boundary and remove smaller stems.
 T75 Sweet Chestnut û Fell.
 T76 Sweet Chestnut û Fell.
 T77 Oak - Remove major deadwood only(inspect for Oak Processionary Moth)
 T78 Lime û Crown lift to 3m, remove major deadwood only
